name: 3D Racer - Project 2
description:
This game is a 3D Racer made in one month in collaboration with Valentin Rippoz and is a project for my school. This was also our first 3D project.

Like the first project, we could freely choose some gameplay aspect and the visuals but had to implement some features (like HP for the ship, 3 A.I.)

The game was designed to work with a PS4 Pad. Sadly you still need a mouse to go trough the menu.
It's still playable with a keyboard but with a french layout (Azerty).

Controls ;

Z / R2 : Acceleration
S / L2 : Brake
QD / Left Stick : Orientation
TAB / Options : Pause menu

Thanks for reading and trying out this game, and asks any question you'd like :)
